note:
Simbarashe Morgen Nyagomo - Businessman and Entrepreneur
As a seasoned businessman and entrepreneur, S. M. Nyagomo
brings a wealth of experience and expertise to the realms of business
and leadership. With a solid foundation in executive business
leadership, earned through dedicated studies at Zimbabwe Open
University in 2009, S M Nyagomo has been a driving force in the
success and growth of prominent enterprises for over a decade.
